document_data.caption: A map showing Nor Tso near the center of the Katakoro Plateau.
document_data.name: Nor Tso
document_data.mainbody: '''Nor Tso''', or the '''Sky Lake''', was a lake in the [[Hordelands]] found near the center of the [[Katakoro Plateau]].
document_data.Geography: The lake sat north of the mighty [[Hungtse River]], forming part of the boundary of the [[Wild Yak Meadows]] to the west. It was fed by the [[Muren Tso]].
document_data.Description: Nor Tso was a large lake that was roughly circular in shape. It covered approximately {{SI|3600|sq mi|k}}.
